title: About Me
text:
Decoding biology with codes.



Faculty of Medicine, Al-Azhar University, Cairo, Egypt




+40 Publications
Experienced in medical writing
Scientific Critical appraisal and Evidence appraisal with GRADE
100 Peer Review in +20 Journals
Omics (Transcriptomics, Epigenomics& Proteomics at the bulk and single cell levels) analysis using R & Python
Dealing with big data
Building and deploying machine learning and deep learning models
Creating automated and reproducible pipelines with Snakemake and Docker
Visual Presentation of the findings using Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator& Biorender
Thanks for checking out my web site!
